title: October 24, 2019: Zilliqa (ZIL): Up 0.55%
text:
Zilliqa Price Update

Zilliqa’s current price, at the time of this writing, is $0.004738 USD, up by approximately 0.55% from the day prior. The past 24 hours mark a reversal in price from the day prior; it should be noted, though, that price is still in a down trend, and is currently 13.63% below its 20 day moving average. Staying above this level may be critical to sustain short-term momentum. In terms of an expected trading range, the Bollinger bands on Zilliqa suggest price may bounce between $0.004743 and $0.006229 based on its momentum and volatility over the past 14 days. Given its boundaries, rangebound traders may find it compelling to entertain buying, as we are nearer to the bottom of the range.

Trade Zilliqa (ZIL) and over 500 other cryptos across ten different exchanges — all from one app. Try Quadency.

The currency’s market cap currently stands at $42 million US dollars.

Daily Engagement Metrics Update

Over the past 24 hours, no transfers have been added to the blockchain recording transactions amongst holders of Zilliqa. In terms of estimating the number of holders, over the past day the total number of wallets holding Zilliqa has gone down by approximately 0. If we observe percentage growth in holders and transfers, we find that Zilliqa ranks 32 out of the 35 Ethereum tokens we are tracking.

Just How Rich are Zilliqa’s Richest Holders?

Of the coin’s total money supply, the richest 1,0000 wallets currently own 97.59%. If we focus on exchanges, which may be an correlated with liquidity and greater confidence in the currency, the exchange wallets that are in the top 1,000 wallets own 3.88% of the currency’s total money supply. Exchange ownership grew by -6.16% over the past week, while the overall ownership percentage of the top 1,000 richest wallets grew by -0.69% over that time period.

How Much Development is Occurring?

The last activity date on Zilliqa’s GitHub repository was October 23, 2019, or about 1 days ago. Over the past 30 days, we’ve seen open issues across Zilliqa’s GitHub repositories grow by 0.17 per day on average, while the number of watchers has grown by 1.6.

What’s Going on Social Media?

If you are interested in following Zilliqa on social media, Twitter, where it has 66,322 following it, may be a good place to start. Use this link to follow Zilliqa on Twitter.

Where to Buy

You can trade Zilliqa, listed under the symbol ZIL, through the following exchanges: Gate, Yobit, Binance, DDEX, Ethfinex.

Article by SixJupiter
